website_summaries.verdict: Trade-offs abound in Sony's Cyber-shot DSC-HX1 megazoom. Though it's fast and has some really novel, useful features, it just doesn't deliver the photo quality expected for its class.
pros: Hand-held Twilight mode produces better-than-average photos in low light

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cameras I bought
customer_reviews.text: This SONY camera is so nice. Getting a little aged now with technology always improving but the shots are still just great. Not sure I need to buy any other camera since this does 99 percent of what I need. Love the versatility of shooting pictures from stills to panorama and movies. Selectable pixel density allows you to take tons of pictures for a SD card or fewer as your need dictates. Color and 20X zoom are terrific. Only extra I wish it had is a remote shutter switch to take time lapse photos.
customer_reviews.author: J2018G

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Sony Cynershot
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Sony Cynershot. Had this same model for about 15 years until a problem developed with the shutter. Hopefully I'll get the same longevity from this one.
customer_reviews.author: jerry a. lay

customer_reviews.title: The camera works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the camera and the people were very professional and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Baker-Snow

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Came in the mail from Amazon, went by the local Sony dealer for a free one hour lesson and took the camera to the Grand Canyon the next day. Unbelievable photos and so easy to use. The panorama shot comes out beautifully and the video is very tight. There is no lag time from when you push to take the photo and get the shot, something that has bothered me w/ other digital cameras. I can't recommend this camera enough. Very versatile, amazing zoom, light weight, for what you get and amazing photos.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is extremely useful. I didn't want to carry a bunch of extra lenses nor did I want a huge attached zooms lens as is standard with removable lenses. This camera can do it all. The sweep mode allows great panorama shots that are automatically stitched together in the camera. There are many modes to shoot in and I am still learning them. The twilight mode works quite well in low light and produces some interesting photos. I have had some unexplained shutdowns, but haven't had time to read the whole manual yet to figure out what is going on. It may be operator error.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L. Snoey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase. Great quality images. Great price, Very easy to use. A little bulky but it does fit well in hand. I absolutely love the panoramic setting when taking "nature" shots. I love the zoom, my kids don't look like ants on the field during their marching band competitions anymore. All in all a great product for the price. I recommend it to anyone who's a beginner, looking to get great quality images and video, with ease of use at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Close to being Professional
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Good features. Indoor photography at it best. Came out with natural color. Flash gives best results. 10fps is ok, but still not so impressive. Anyway we are not professionals to use this feature in its way. Panorama feature is mind blowing. Video quality is commendable. If you have a extra lighting indoor shooting will be interesting. Focusing time is very very short. Sony kept its word. Almost all features worked well. I am still experimenting on it. As of now after using the camera for 3 weeks and taking more than 800 photos I am really impressed with it. I just switched over from Panasonic Lumix FZ8. I am not at all disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the pictures and videos it takes
customer_reviews.text: I already have this camera but bought a second one so I can use one to video tape while taking stills with the other one. I'm very happy with the pictures and videos it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Sony DSC H camera. I have loved everyone of them. Great images, easy to use, lightweight to carry. Love the extra zoom on the HX1 and rapid fps. The panarama reature is not as great as hyped; can't print them with my photomate so still figuring out how to get them printed. Only negative: emailed sony customer service and no reply back.
customer_reviews.author: Tina from Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement camera for my old Sony Cyber Shot I purchased in 2006. I chose the Nikon Coolpix L120 and hated it so much I returned it after 2 days. The Nikon was cheaper and I always heard Nikon cameras were to be of outstanding quality. I decided to return to Sony and purchased the Cybershot DSC-HX1. It is very user friendly and takes wonderful quality photos. It's a great camera and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about photography, but I am so pleased with this camera. I made this video with the Sony DSC-HX1 and was delighted with the results. I started experimenting with still shots and found that quite easy to understand. I wanted to try the video feature, so I made this video of myself playing the piano in my home. When I played it back I could hardly believe the results...the video quality is simply outstanding. I am extremely pleased with this camera and plan on trying many of the other features because it has a lot to offer. Anyone who buys this camera should be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: best of the bests
customer_reviews.text: I think this camera is the best in its class. Before this I had dsc-h9 which has excellent image quality.Almost a year I've been using A350 DSLR (with tamron70-300 lens). if you got bored carrying heavy dslr bags with heavy lenses, this is for you. Very sexy black construction. it is not heavy. Battery is ok. Perfect for travelling. In low light conditions you don't even need a tripod. Just hold it close to your body and use tilt function of lcd. I wish hx1 had carlzeiss optic and remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Emirhan Oznalbant

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for the last 15 days, and it's almost perfect for an amateur, as I am. I can't talk about the auto settings, because I always shoot in Manual setting. The image quality is very good, also in very law light conditions, easy to use, light weight, feels good in hand. Of course there're always things that the brand could improve: minimum ISO is 125, in Manual setting there's only one button to set ISO, speed and f., you have to go to the menu to set in telefoto, and little other things that are to improve. In summary, a very very good camera for amateurs. I heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zelmira

customer_reviews.title: Wow, great improvement from the H50 purchased 1yr ago
customer_reviews.text: You'll be surprised as to the level of improvement that this camera has vs her sister H50. Image Quality is very very good, movies are great in almost HD, menus are much friendlier. Panoramas are something that you will not use much after the initial excitement. I have Canon SLR with costly lenses and this camera is a great deal for what you are getting. I will surely recommend it to anyone, novice or amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my daughter for Christmas after reading all the reviews I could find and speaking to a camera salesman. My daughter was very surprised and pleased with the camera and stated that it gives her the ability to manually adjust as needed with the ease of a totally automatic camera!
customer_reviews.author: DawnC50

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, good price, great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as an upgrade frome my DSC-H7 and I must say that worth the money. It's easy to use, fast when I need it to be, great quality pics. The only thing that I regret is that it doesn't come with a remote control to shot pics or show pics or videos on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: RZC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good camera for the job. The first one we ordered, from a different company, was broke and this was a replacement. It works and helped keep us in our job. Thanks and it is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger B Jungroth

customer_reviews.title: a great camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave my daughter the camera for Christmas. She did a lot of research before choosing this model and she loves it. Lightweight, easy to use, common sense features as well as being a great gadget!!!Definitely a good investment for someone who is serious about taking photographs.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i usually buy a regular digital cameras i was looking for something that was easy to learn and easy to use... this is this camera. great quality in pictures, it was really easy to learn what does what. Wish i would've had this camera along time ago. worth every penny i spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera because I wanted to take better quality photos than a simple point and shoot, but didn't want a big, heavy camera with multiple lenses. It's really easy to use but has a lot of nice features if you really want to dig in and start advanced shooting. The best feature, by far, is the sensitive shooting & night shooting capabilities. I've never had more vibrant night photos than with this camera. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: kelly_ann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic!!!!!! I'm not a big photography buff, or at least I wasn't. I mainly use it for family pics and its great, it gives me perfect still shots of my running, jumping, swinging daughter. I have taken it for a spin with some nature photos and they have turned out beautifully. I understand that many actual photographers may have some issues with some of the features, but for someone who just wants to take pictures of the family or family outings it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this camera a few days ago and I love it. It is nice and light to carry around. Takes great photos, the zoom on it is so good and the speed at which it takes the pictures is great. I took some pictures of a humming bird last night and you can actually see the wings and they are not blurred at all. I will be taking this camera on our driving trip from MA to VA to GA and when I get back I will have more to review, but so far I'm in Love!
customer_reviews.author: K. Flamand

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Piece!!! I am just loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: Good to handle. Though being a compact camera it is bound to be slight bigger. Sweep Panorama works real good. Awesome Macro Shots. Plus point is the zoom. 20X - you will be amazed to see the craters on the MOON. Besides the HD video recording is a great plus point. I made my short movie using this camera and guess what - I won the first prize. Awesome piece in all.
customer_reviews.author: Shree

customer_reviews.title: perfect for busy mom
customer_reviews.text: i have used this for taking photos as my daughter's fastpitch softball games. I have been able to take photos through the backstop without having all of the lines from the fencing. We have used the burst of photos to look at her batting swing. You can sit in the stands and get photos of the kids in the outfield that show their expressions clearly. I recomend this camera for those who want more than just a point and shoot and want to use the many setting available.
customer_reviews.author: kcspringer1

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent camera, good resolution, good pictures and a very good article guadar fond memories of the family, and always keep them in mind, recommended
customer_reviews.author: rosy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!! This was a very good camera, still works great , for sure a good buy!! Sony really did a great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: For those adventurous amateur photographer, this camera will fit all your needs! So much fun with sweep panorama functionality! Nice pictures in low light conditions due to its technology which increases the light exposure by taking six pictures and integrating them. Of course, best results (less grain in pictures) might be achieved by increasing the exposure time at low ISO, but it may result in poor pictures of (not necessarily fast) moving subjects.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Flores

customer_reviews.title: works good  in enough light only
customer_reviews.text: not good at low light and high speed movement . only take good picture when enough light. always indoor picture not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Emad A. Thahab

customer_reviews.title: Love this new camera
customer_reviews.text: Moving up from a P&S camera to one with a few more options was the best move for me. I had a Sony, was happy but needed more choices.This one was the best of the 3 I tried. Nokia & Canon were on my list, but didn't make the cut for one basic reason, ease of use.Even the instructions were simple to follow. I was up and shooting in an hour.The price was great too.
customer_reviews.author: A. mcgirr

customer_reviews.title: Praise from a true amateur
customer_reviews.text: I bought this DSC-HX1 because it is fully automatic but allows manual operation if desired. Having had it for less than a month, I have not yet read the instruction manuel so I have only used it in automatic mode. I am pleased with the ease of operation and the quality of picture it takes automatically. I am anxious to begin to learn and use its many features.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! Takes beautiful, clear pictures! The adjustable screen on the back is great. Used it at a get together and was able to get a good group shot from above and still see what I was doing! My mom is even convinced that this needs to be her next camera as well!
customer_reviews.author: Marla D. Nourse

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1 9.1MP Digital  Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have just received my Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1 9.1 Digital Camera 8/31/09 and & here's an up date review of this item thst will be list below here.Last month one took a vacation cruise for 9 nights with five port-of-call for Portland,&Bar Harbor,Me.& St.John,New Brunswick,plus Halifax,Nova Scotia,plus Boston,Mass.where one give this here Digital camera a real work out as one was very pleased with all my 246 Photo's taken.This up date report was done 10/20/09 a month after coming back from my vacation cruise taken.I am very pleased with my new Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1 Digital Camera.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: I am loving this camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Easy to use. My photos now looks like made by a professional.The panorama mode is very usefull. I made some movies and for me they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: FBB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to make proffesional photos for someone who's not a pro. Sony made the impossible possible the price, tecnology, everything that comes within that makes this camera some awsome camera, and that defenitly makes it to have no other like it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Levanti

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect camera if you don't live out of it, good enough to take out once in a while. A lot of features if you are used to point and shoot cameras but really few if you are a pro, but just a couple of them are just amazing even for an SLR camera (sweep panorama, 10 pics in one sec...). Very good picture quality and excellent videos. Well built, feels expensive, comfortable and not too big or heavy. Very recommendable if you want a really good not expensive camera to take good pictures every now and then. Some minor details?... of course!!! but nothing too annoying to prevent you from giving it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Horasmail

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera. It takes wonderful pictures and videos. I wish that it had a higher MP rate instead of just 9.1 but its still worth it. The portability is not great it is bulky and when you have a 1 year old its not easy to juggle both but i had though about that before buying so im okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: HX1-Awesome camera with exciting features !
customer_reviews.text: Went through a lot review to buy Sony DSC HX1. This being my first Digital camera, still trying to learn all the Manual controls in it. Sweep panorama was awesome and out of the world. Looks big but not bulky. Easy to carry and feels Solid. Easy to use and settings are user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Dpk0505

customer_reviews.title: The best Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the third HX Sony camera I own, I have always like the inclination on the Lents before and the screen now the image quality is superb, and the new features are just great, it is smaller than their predecessors which makes it great for traveling and you don't lose all the features of a big professional camera, I have taken some pretty amazing photos with the panoramic feature and it is really easy to use, the camera is beautiful and ergonomically well design.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Carbonell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera!! The quality of shots is amazing and the feature to have panoramic shots is awesome. I also use it for video and the video is amazing.... great product overall....
customer_reviews.author: XA

customer_reviews.title: SONY QUALITY, AWESOME PRICE, USED BUT NEW IN BOX
customer_reviews.text: I will now shop looking for electronics when it says USED and see if they are NEW in BOX, I saved 50%. My 15 year old son loves it. A great Birthday Present for his 16th Birthday. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rock N Roll

customer_reviews.title: Best Camara Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camara. It takes great pictures and you have so many options. I feel like a pro. I just got it so I don't know how long the battery holds its charge. I would recommend this camara to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Traverska

customer_reviews.title: The good and the disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the camera. I did a lot of research before making the purchase and the results have lived up to my expectations. The disappoinging feature involves Amazon.com. The Amazon advertisment stated that if you purchase this camera a 4Gb. memory stick duo will be included at no extra charge. There was no memory stick either installed in the camera or included as a separate item. I wrote to Amazon 2 weeks ago about this oversight but have not had the courtesy of a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews written by so called professionals are all [...]! This is a great camera. P. S. this camera is right there with many DSLRs I have used. Photo quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Federico V. Tijerina

customer_reviews.title: So much more than i exspected
customer_reviews.text: this camerais so much more than i exspected very easy to use, the panarama feature is great and it is hard to find the right words for the video quality, its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Sony HX-1.Everything it is advertised to be.
customer_reviews.text: Excellant point and shoot.As good as some DSLR cameras.The HD movie mode and Sweep/panning mode work very well.An awesome little point and shoot.The 20x zoom is amazing.Get an extra battery and an 8 GB card.You'll need it for video.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Sony
customer_reviews.text: I picked this camera up for a trip I was taking and I didnt want to carry my DSLR while hiking. I am totally amazed at the pictures this takes and the panorama mode is super! I also found it worked well under some bad lighting conditions. I am anxious to continue to learn all of the features this camera has to offer. Dont be afraid to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Elainer7

customer_reviews.title: Excelent performance
customer_reviews.text: this machine is perfect for non professional who wants 2 in 1, take pictures and film.
customer_reviews.author: zoilo100

customer_reviews.title: ESPECTACULAR
customer_reviews.text: SOY NOVATA CON CAMARAS PROFESIONALES, NO TENGO IDEA DE COMO MANEJAR LAS NUMEROSAS FUNCIONES QUE TRAEN Y QUE HAY QUE COMBINAR MANUALMENTE. ESTA CAMARA (SEMIPROFESIONAL) HACE TODO SOLA, SI BIEN PERMITE, A QUIENES SABEN, HACERLO MANUALMENTE TAMBIEN. TIENE UNA CALIDAD DE IMAGEN ESPECTACULAR Y TE PERMITE EDITAR TUS FOTOS CON NUMEROSOS EFECTOS QUE LE DAN UN TOQUE ESPECIAL A TUS FOTOS SIN NECESIDAD DE SABER NADA SOBRE FOTOGRAFIA. ES MUY LIVIANA Y SU TAMAÑO ES IDEAL. LA RECOMIENDO 100%
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner, easy to use, can't wait to learn more about photography!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: poor sony customer relations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased his camera in March, by May after only using it three times the battery would not take a charge. After several emails, calls and hours Sony is not standing by the product which is 3 months into the warranty to replace the battery & charger as they said they would. Then after several hours on the phone with Sony customer relations we still have not had any sucess in getting the pasrts need for our camera to function. I will NOT buy another Sony product!
customer_reviews.author: unhappy Sony customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD GOOD GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I received what was expected. The package came earlier than and the camera came within it's box with all proper appliances. Also, there was an extra 8GB memory card in there which made the purchase even MORE worth while. The camera works great, the two manuals that come with it are straight forward for the best results with every shot. So many modes, tons of self preferences to get real quality pictures. The video is alright, expected a little bit more from it, but with the proper editing they should come out great
customer_reviews.author: MARCUS

customer_reviews.title: Make you a professional Photographer!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use, with it you become a professional photographer with its incredible interface. definitely one of the best purchases I've made, 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chucho

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This camera really worths the amount spent. Its very easy to use, so if you are not an expert, you will still be able to take great pics.
customer_reviews.author: Mirela

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC=HX1 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far it has taken great pictures. After a little time you will learn how to use all the features. I haven't had the camera that long. Took it to Disney World and shot a ton of pictures and movies. Like I said pictures look great when viewed on the camera. I haven't downloaded them to my computer yet.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J. Folco

customer_reviews.title: Review of Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift--I did not personally use it, but heard from the recipient that it was great and she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Davey

customer_reviews.title: Free memory card is not for this camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera from Amazon and it was supposed to come with a free memory card. Firstly, I had trouble understanding how to get the free card, because the instructions are pretty unclear. Amazon was nice enough and rushed me a free memory card, but it does not fit the camera. The free memory card is an SDHC card, while the required card is a Memory Stick Pro Duo flash memory card. Without the card, the camera has only 11mb of memory, so it only holds a few pix. Despite the fact that I haven't taken any pictures, the camera itself is of high quality and I'm eager to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle W. Money

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1 is an awesome camera. I am so glad I upgraded to this camera. I will always go with Sony and the price is the best yet. I would buy from ABT anytime. Excellent dealers. The panorama is extremely easy to use. I recommend this camera to all who love to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Armstrong

product_meta.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-HX1 9.1MP 20x Optical Zoom Digital Camera with Super Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 Inch LCD
feature_bullets: 9.0-megapixel Exmor CMOS image sensor for photo-quality pictures up to 13 x 19 inches
Capture up to 10 frames per second; HD (1080p) movie capture
3.0-inch Clear Photo LCD tilt display; 90-degree tilt, horizontal and vertical
11 MB built-in memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/Memory Stick Pro Duo media (not included)
